strapiPost.title: Art To Remember
strapiPost.content:
The Downtown Rogers Art on the Bricks Art Walk is today featuring art and music from military veterans, as well as artwork by local middle schoolers.

  • Military art: Musicians from the Soldiers Songs and Voices Northwest Arkansas will be performing during the event with a host of other pop-up galleries scattered across downtown Rogers.
  • The younger generation: Student portfolios from Greer Lingle Middle School will be on display at the pop-up in Ozark Talent Bank. The junior artists will be available to present their work and learn how it feels to host a gallery.

More information about the event can be found HERE.
